typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select [AID],[L\/NL],[any_ASV],[RegistrationDate],[MonthNumber],[Month],[SaltKeyID] from [ASData_PL].[DAS_Dashboard_Registration]',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		AID as string,
		{L\/NL} as string,
		any_ASV as string,
		RegistrationDate as string,
		MonthNumber as string,
		Month as string,
		SaltKeyID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
